TermDefinition.DefinitionText: An indolent (slow-growing) type of non-Hodgkin lymphoma marked by enlarged lymph nodes and a mix of large cells and small cells that have cleaved (u-shaped) nuclei.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "grade 2 follicular lymphoma"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "linfoma folicular de grado 2"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Tipo de linfoma no Hodgkin indolente (de crecimiento lento) que se caracteriza por ganglios linfáticos agrandados y una combinación de células grandes y pequeñas que tienen núcleos hendidos (en forma de u).
